snippet.title: The Amazing Crackpots Club! - Official Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
⭐🫖⭐ Wishlist and play the demo NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2474020/The_Amazing_Crackpots_Club/ ⭐🫖⭐ 

✨🪄 The Amazing Crackpots Club! is a fast-paced, action-packed magic duel in a 2D arena, where wizards throw powerful spells trying to destroy the opponent’s giant potion flask, while using their magic to protect their own flask from incoming attacks.

The Amazing Crackpots Club! is launching soon on Steam! 🎩
You can play our demo now! 🧙
Join us during the Steam Next Fest  from February 5 through February 12.  🔮
Join our socials here: https://beacons.ai/iguanabee 🪄
